title: Granny lives in Galway
brief_description: An excerpt from the film ‘Fligh of the Doves’, focusing on a story about a brother and sister who escape from a cruel stepfather in England and search for their grandmother who lives in a cottage in Galway, Ireland. Based on the book by Walter Macken.
